downloadTitle: Windows PowerShell scripts to configure cloud hybrid search for SharePoint
downloadDescription: Download these Windows PowerShell scripts to configure cloud hybrid search for SharePoint.
detailsSection:
When you configure cloud hybrid search for SharePoint, follow the instructions in Configure cloud hybrid search – roadmap. The instructions include running the Windows PowerShell script CreateCloudSSA.ps1 to create and configure a cloud Search service application (cloud SSA) on a SharePoint Server 2013 or SharePoint Server 2016 server. You'll also find instructions for running the PowerShell script Onboard-CloudHybridSearch.ps1 to connect your cloud SSA and your Office 365 tenant and set up server-to-server authentication for the two environments.

The Windows PowerShell script CreateCloudSSA.ps1 works for all Office 365 plans. The Windows PowerShell script Onboard-CloudHybridSearch.ps1 works for all Office 365 plans except Office 365 US Government Defense.

Version history
Apr20: The parameter 'Credential' of Onboard-CloudHybridSearch.ps1 becomes unnecessary.
Jun18: Updated Onboard-CloudHybridSearch.ps1 to support the MSOnline AAD Powershell module installed from the PowerShell Gallery. Previously the msi was available from the Microsoft Connect portal, but this portal has been retired. Sep17: Added option to create the cloud SSA with search architecture that supports high availability (across two servers).
Jul17: Added suport for Office 365 US Government Defense.
Jun17: Added support for Office 365 operated by 21 Vianet and Office 365 US Government Community.
Apr17: Added support for Office 365 Germany.
systemRequirementsSection: The file is a zipped folder that contains two Windows PowerShell script (ps1) files.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Choose Save or Save this program to disk to copy the download to your computer.
